definition: to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound

sentences.english: This article mainly introduces an improved system of mate-grinding servo valve.
sentences.chinese: 文章介紹了經這改進的伺服閥氣動配磨系統。

sentences.english: To solve the problem, the welding joint construction was re-designed and argon-arc welding was employed.
sentences.chinese: 解決措施爲採用氬弧焊，改進焊接結構設計等。

sentences.english: The script could be improved by displaying the picks in a Keno-style board.
sentences.chinese: 可以通過在基諾樣式板中顯示選擇結果來改進腳本。

sentences.english: This reduces the complexity of our work and offers run time performance improvements.
sentences.chinese: 這減少了工作的複雜性，並可以提供運行時性能改進。

sentences.english: And maybe they continue to improve their arsenals.
sentences.chinese: 也許他們會繼續改進其核武庫。

sentences.english: That, in turn, improves the quality of decision making.
sentences.chinese: 反過來，這又改進了決策制定的質量。

sentences.english: The effect of atomizing is better and burning is more full by improving nozzle structure inside and outside.
sentences.chinese: 同時改進燒嘴結構，使霧化效果更好，燃燒更加完全。

sentences.english: Therefore, it is necessary to improve the current navigation means of the subsonic vehicle.
sentences.chinese: 因此，有必要對亞音速飛行器的導航方案進行改進。

sentences.english: Objective Identification of methyl-dopa to improve the methods.
sentences.chinese: 目的對甲基多巴鑑別改進方法。

sentences.english: Finally, modification of the lathe assembly is discussed about.
sentences.chinese: 最後對筘座組合體的改進進行了探討。

sentences.english: In concrete construction, improvement is made to traditional suspension crossing structure.
sentences.chinese: 在具體施工中，對傳統懸索跨越結構作了改進。

sentences.english: It was an adaptation of Wilson's cloud chamber, filled with nitrogen gas.
sentences.chinese: 這只是對威爾遜氮氣雲室的一種改進。

sentences.english: It is proved that the improved tee distributor runs well in production practice.
sentences.chinese: 改進後的三通分料器使用效果良好。

sentences.english: Objective To improve the TLC identification of Unguentum tetracycline.
sentences.chinese: 目的對四環素軟膏薄層色譜鑑別法進行改進。

sentences.english: The enhancements allow for sending and receiving short C2CK pulses.
sentences.chinese: 這些改進允許發送和接收短的C2CK脈衝。

sentences.english: China can also launch the improved version of the "Sunburn."
sentences.chinese: 也可以發射中國改進版的“日炙”。

definition: to put to use/to apply/practical/applied (science, linguistics etc)/application/practical use/(computing) app
norm/standard/specification/regulation/rule/within the rules/to fix rules/to regulate/to specify
innovation/to bring forth new ideas/to blaze new trails
one step further/to move forward a step/further onwards
to draw on (others' experience)/to learn from (how others do things)/lesson to be learned (by observing others)
